scripts.create:component: mkdir -p ./src/components/$npm_config_name/Layout ./src/components/$npm_config_name/Style && sed s/PLACEHOLDER/$npm_config_name/g ./npm-templates/layout.jsx > ./src/components/$npm_config_name/Layout/index.jsx && sed s/PLACEHOLDER/$npm_config_name/g ./npm-templates/component.jsx > ./src/components/$npm_config_name/index.jsx && touch ./src/components/$npm_config_name/Style/index.css
